docs.snippet: Tymon Markowski spent time exploring the towns and villages along the banks of Poland’s Brda River, encountering strange and amusing scenes.

docs.snippet: An official at the United States consulate in Guadalajara, the second-largest city in Mexico, was shot by a man who stalked him in a parking lot.

docs.snippet: Sage Sohier has recreated old family photographs, replacing the idealized figures in the pictures with the bodies that her mother — a former model — and two daughters — now have.

docs.snippet: For almost two years, Mayor Bill de Blasio has been arguing that Albany should allow New York City to levy a new tax on home sales above $2 million. It hasn’t worked out.

headline.print_headline: Pursuing Mansion Tax, Mayor Embraces a Snowball’s Odds
